mapper.select: select * reply r left join board b on r.b_no=b.b_no left join member m on r.m_id=m.m_id and b.m_id=m.m_id where r.r_no=#{rNo} and b.b_no=#{bNo.bNo} and m.m_id=#{mId.mId}
select * reply r left join board b on r.b_no=b.b_no left join member m on r.m_id=m.m_id and b.m_id=m.m_id
mapper.insert: insert into reply (m_id, b_no, r_content, r_date) values (#{mId.mId}, #{bNo.bNo}, #{rContent}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.delete: delete from reply where r_no=#{rNo} and b_no=#{bNo.bNo} and m_id=#{mId.mId}
mapper.update: update reply set r_content=#{rContent}, r_date=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where r_no=#{rNo} and b_no=#{bNo.bNo} and m_id=#{mId.mId}
